statements.text: Well, Mr. SayeDeen emailed me. He saw my website and thought to hire me
He told me I was the nearest Archivist in proximity to the retreat. It made sense.

appendingNode.text: Immediate access to my tools and materials. If in incident happened or I forgot materials I could go to my office
My office is a 30 minutes drive from here

statements.text: I could leave to my place and then return, but I'm trapped here like everyone else
